DOC.detailed_description: Purpose compare introduction NIPPV nBiPAP term mechanical ventilation ( MV ) need ( non-invasive respiratory support failure ) surfactant need within first 72 hour life preterm infant Respiratory Distress Syndrome ( RDS ) 26-30 week gestation . Method Primary Outcome Measures : In NIPPV BIPAP group , comparison mechanical ventilation ( MV ) need ( non-invasive respiratory support failure ) surfactant need within first 72 hour life Secondary Outcome Measures : - Compare patient ' need total duration invasive non-invasive respiratory support duration free oxygen - Compare oxygen need postnatal day 28 week 36 - Compare presence severity BPD ( Bronchopulmonary dysplasia ) - Compare premature morbidity PDA ( patent ductus arteriosus ) , IVH ( intraventricular haemorrhage ) , NEC ( necrotizing enterocolitis ) , ROP ( retinopathy prematurity ) - Compare feed intolerance , reach birth weight transition full oral feeding time , hospitalization period - Compare neurodevelopment postnatal age 2 Study Design In NIPPV group ; non-synchronous mode use , titrate FiO2 : 021-0.50 respiratory rate 20-40 / min , peak inspiratory pressure ( PIP ) : 15-20 end-expiratory pressure ( PEEP ) :5-6 cm H2O target oxygen saturation : 90-95 % . In nBiPAP group ; titrate 021-0.50 , non-synchronized PEEP:6 H2O , pressure amplitude : 3 cm H2O , FiO2 target oxygen saturation 90-95 % . Under non-invasive respiratory support , case FiO2 ≥ 0.40 , surfactant give early rescue therapy mean non-invasive method ( use thin catheter - take care method- spontaneous breathe continue ) order keep target oxygen saturation 90-95 % . The second dose surfactant give 6 hour first dose mean non-invasive method order keep target oxygen saturation 90-95 % case FiO2 need ≥ 0.30 . Non-invasive respiratory support failure set follow : - FiO2 ≥ 0.50 order keep oxygen saturation measure pulse oximetry 90 % high , - Apnea require 6 alert 24 -hour period 6 consecutive hour 1 apnea require positive pressure ventilation , - Persistent acidosis ; presence pH < 7.20 PCO2 > 65 mmHg two different blood gas draw interval least 30 minute treatment-resistant metabolic acidosis , - Severe respiratory distress , - Pulmonary haemorrhage cardiopulmonary arrest .
